posting_body: Easy access to I-90 & I-405 and access to parks & trails****
SPACIOUS & OPEN AREA DESIGN FLOOR~3 BED/2 BATH HOME FOR RENT#
Gorgeous rambler in the fantastic neighborhood of Spiritridge.
Spacious & open area design floor plan w/ gleaming hardwood floors, formal living room, family room & large dining room.
Slate & butcher block counters, Stainless steel appliances, bright skylights, master bdr w/ huge walk in closet, 5 piece master bath with jetted tub.
This home has it all, flat & fenced backyard enjoys sunny western exposure.
Easy access to I-90 & I-405 and access to parks & trails.
